price: 31. Markaasaan waxaan soo bixinnay iyaga kadambow fac kale (qoonkii Caad).
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
